tenantId.Description: Id of the tenant. Can be found in the Azure Active Directory blade.

clientId.Description: Client Id of the SetLibraryVersion AAD application. Must have Sites.FullControl or Sites.Selected for sites to be processed. Both MSGraph and SharePoint APIs

thumbprint.Description: Thumbprint of the certific from the device running Set Version script.

inputCSV.Description: CSV file with list of sites to process

majorVersionCount.Description: Numner of major versions to configure on the Libraries (0 will disable major versions)

minorVersionCount.Description: Numner of minor versions to configure on the Libraries (0 will disable minor versions)

whatIfMode.Description: If true, storage saving will be calculated but files won't be deleted.

deleteOldMajorVersions.Description: If true, item versions that are less than the count will be removed.
